index.description: Provides valid information to the user from the GtWAW developers/staff.

get.description: Provides a list URL's for schedule results for given user.

post.description: Adds a new schedule to the databse. Returns a key value pair of the created schedule or an error message.

put.description: Updates provided schdule with new information. Returns the updated object or error message.

get.description: Returns a user with provided credentials. Valid credentials include 'id' and 'email'.

post.description: Creates a new user. Returns the created object as a key-value pair or returns an error message. Emails must be unique.

put.description: Updates a user with the provided information. Returns the created object as a key-value pair or returns an error message. Emails must be unique.
